00028 const int Math::MultiplyDeBruijnBitPosition[32] = {
00029   0, 1, 28, 2, 29, 14, 24, 3, 30, 22, 20, 15, 25, 17, 4, 8, 
00030   31, 27, 13, 23, 21, 19, 16, 7, 26, 12, 18, 6, 11, 5, 10, 9

00033 int32_t Math::log2(uint32_t v) {
00034 
00035   v |= v >> 1; // first round down to power of 2 
00036   v |= v >> 2;
00037   v |= v >> 4;
00038   v |= v >> 8;
00039   v |= v >> 16;
00040   v = (v >> 1) + 1;
00041 
00042   return MultiplyDeBruijnBitPosition[(uint32_t)(v * 0x077CB531U) >> 27];
00043 }
